name: Tarox Bladewing
originalText:
Flying, haste
Grandeur Discard another card named Tarox Bladewing: Tarox Bladewing gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

rulings.text: The +X/+X bonus is based on Tarox Bladewing’s power at the time the ability resolves. It won’t change if Tarox’s power changes later in the turn.
